hadiths.text: It was narrated from Harith bin Bilal bin Harith, that his father said:“I said: ‘O Messenger of Allah, do you think that this cancellation of Hajj and it being replaced with ‘Umrah is only for us, or for all people?’ The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘No, it is only for us.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَالَ كَانَ فَسْخُ الْحَجِّ لَهُمْ خَاصَّةً
chapter.eng-name: Whoever said that the Hajj was canceled only for them
